blogPost.excerpt: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
blogPost.body: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
blogPost.title: Repl.it Teams for Education - Zero-setup collaborative cloud IDE for teachers and students
blogPost.author: Derrick McMillen
